description:
Cool World Clock is renamed easyClock!
easyClock is a handy world clock which makes it ridiculously easy look up world times and plan meetings/conference calls across time zones.

Features: 
- Time zone information of 650+ cities across the world 
- Deal with daylight saving time for you 
- Support Exhibition mode!
- Now works in both Landscape and Portrait mode

How to use:
- Tap time of cities or home to show the arrow buttons. Tap arrow button to move 10 minutes forward/backward
- Press and hold the buttons to move faster: 1 hour forward/backward
- Double tap on the screen to exit time conversion mode
- Swipe on city to delete it
- Enable exhibition mode: go to Launcher->Settings->Exhibition, check easyClock in application list 

For feedback & suggestions please feel free to contact on twitter: @jeffyuanjeff or email: jeffyuanjeff@gmail.com.
